column3:
Maru is anxiously awaiting someone's return.

※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.
<Split(<Highlight>ObjectParameter(1)</Highlight>, ,1)/>, you haven't seen a broodin' Rider carryin' a couple of jugs of valras oil, have you?
He's a tough bloke, so I didn't think twice about sendin' him off to pummel valras─but now I'm worried somethin' might've happened.
I reckon you're even tougher than he is, so would you mind seekin' him out? He should be on the Perfumed Rise somewhere─an' hopefully he ain't dismantled.
...I owe you my thanks. Circumstances forbade my retreat.
I shall retrieve the oil and return posthaste. Tell this to Maru, if you would.
Upon seeing this fragile creature in mortal peril, I am shamed to admit that I forgot myself... Tell Maru I shall return with the oil anon.
Did you find him in one piece?
Of course he did... He's usually a sober-minded fellow, but all bets are off when a little critter gets involved.
Anyway, I'm relieved to hear he's alright. Wasn't sure what I was gonna do if he wasn't...
I'll keep this in mind the next time I send him out on a job. Thanks for helpin' out as always, <Split(<Highlight>ObjectParameter(1)</Highlight>, ,1)/>!
